程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.common

类 LocalStoreManager

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.common.AbstractStoreManager
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.common.LocalStoreManager
所有已实现的接口:
StoreManager
public abstract class LocalStoreManager
extends AbstractStoreManager
Abstract Store Manager used as the basis for local StoreManager implementations. Simplifies common configuration management.
作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
